author: Maureen Breslin
title: Russian troops enter Kyiv outskirts: report | TheHill
description: Russian troops on Friday reached the outskirts of Kyiv as Ukrainian forces fought back again...
content:
Russian troops on Friday reached the outskirts of Kyiv as Ukrainian forces fought back against Russia's military offensive, The New York Times reports.
